Conclusion:

As we can tell from BLEU score, as the size of training set increase, the score
of 1st order and 2nd order increase obviously. As for 3rd order score, there is a 
huge increase from 1K to 10K, then fluctuate within a range, which means the 3rd order
score cannot be improved by simply increasing the training set.

The biggest different I can tell from these two references is: Human translation tends to 
be more descriptive, while google translation is simple and short. Combine the two reference
together, the BLEU score is more accurate.
